translation.ja: フランク もっとロウソクをつけるわね

translation.en: by the time you got back.
translation.ja: もっとロウソクをつけるわね

translation.en: Darling, what's the matter?
translation.ja: あなた どうかした？

translation.en: Frank?
You look like you've seen a ghost.
I'm not at all sure that I haven't.
When he pushed past me, he was close enough that I should have felt him brush my sleeve as he passed,
translation.ja: 彼が僕の横をすり抜けた時 気配を感じなかった

translation.en: but I... I didn't.
translation.ja: 彼が僕の横をすり抜けた時 気配を感じなかった 全くね

translation.en: And then I turned around to say something, and he had gone.
translation.ja: 振り返った時には もういなかった

translation.en: He just vanished. That's when I
translation.ja: 忽然(こつぜん)と消えてたんだ

translation.en: felt a chill down my spine.
Did you have many Scots in your charge during the war?
translation.ja: 患者の中に スコットランド人も？

translation.en: Yes, there was quite a few.
translation.ja: ええ たくさんいたわ

translation.en: There was one in particular.
translation.ja: 特に思い出深い人がいる

translation.en: He was a piper in the Third Seaforths.
translation.ja: 第３シーフォース団所属で

translation.en: He couldn't stand being stuck with a needle. It was...
translation.ja: 注射をされるのが 大の苦手だった

translation.en: All right.
What is it exactly, that,
you're asking me, Frank?
When I saw that chap staring up at you,
I thought he might be someone you had nursed. Someone who might be looking for you now
translation.ja: 君が世話した患者が 来たのかと思ってね

translation.en: to reconnect.
To reconnect?
It wouldn't be unusual.
I mean, it wouldn't be surprising if you had sought some...
translation.ja: 君に そういう相手がいても―

translation.en: Comfort, or...
Are you asking me if I've been unfaithful?
translation.ja: 疑ってるの？ 私が浮気したと

translation.en: Claire.
Is that what you think of me, Frank?
translation.ja: 私を そんな女だと？

translation.en: No, darling. No.
No. All I meant was that even if you had,
translation.ja: たとえ そうでも 僕の思いは 変わらないってことさ

translation.en: it will make no difference to me. I love you.
translation.ja: 僕の思いは 変わらないってことさ

translation.en: And nothing you could ever do could stop my loving you.
translation.ja: 何があろうと君を愛してる

translation.en: Forgive me.
Forgive me?
Of course.
Sex was our bridge back to one another.
translation.ja: セックスは私たちの絆

translation.en: The one place where we always met.
Whatever obstacles presented themselves during the day or night,
translation.ja: たとえ どんな障害があろうと

translation.en: we could seek out and find each other again in bed.
translation.ja: ベッドの中では分かり合える

translation.en: As long as we had that,
I had faith everything would work out.
translation.ja: 全てうまくいくと思えた

translation.en: That reminds me, I want to set an alarm.
translation.ja: 目覚ましをかけるのを忘れてた

translation.en: No.
I thought we weren't setting alarms on this trip.
translation.ja: 旅行中 目覚ましはなしよ

translation.en: I want to see the witches.
Must I ask?
Apparently, there's a circle of standing stones on a hill just outside the village,
translation.ja: 村外れの丘に ストーンサークルがあって

translation.en: and there's a local group who still observe rituals there.
translation.ja: 地元の人が 儀式を行ってるそうだ

translation.en: Well, they're not actually witches. This lot are meant to be druids.
translation.ja: 正確には “ドルイド教の祭司”たちだ

translation.en: Sadly, I don't think there'll be a coven of devil- worshippers.
translation.ja: 魔女の集会ではないらしい

translation.en: Well, it's a pity.
Can't imagine anything I'd rather do.
translation.ja: ぜひ参加したかったのに

translation.en: Liar.
Where will we be watching this spectacle?
A place called Craigh na Dun.
translation.ja: クレイグ･ナ･デューンだ

translation.en: So, according to local folklore,
these stones were carried here from Africa by a race of Celtic giants.
translation.ja: 石はケルト族の巨人が アフリカから運んできた

translation.en: I wasn't aware that Celts made a lot of trips to Africa.
translation.ja: ケルト族が アフリカに旅してたなんて

translation.en: Only the giant ones.
Is that Inverness?
Yes, it must be.
Someone's coming.
Is that Mrs. Graham?
I think it is. The Reverend's housekeeper is a witch.
translation.ja: 牧師の家政婦さんは魔女か

translation.en: Not a witch. Druid, remember?
translation.ja: 違うわ　祭司(ドルイド)でしょ

translation.en: They should have been ridiculous, and perhaps they were.
translation.ja: バカげてると思うのが 普通だろう

translation.en: Parading in circles on top of a hill.
translation.ja: 輪になって歩く女たち

translation.en: But the hairs on the back of my neck prickled at the sight,
translation.ja: でも 見てて 首筋がゾクゾクした

translation.en: and some small voice inside warned me
translation.ja: 心の声が私に警告する

translation.en: I wasn't supposed to be here.
translation.ja: お前は招かれざる客だと

translation.en: I was an unwelcome voyeur to something ancient and powerful.
translation.ja: 古代の強大な何かを 盗み見てるような気がした

translation.en: Wait for me! I'm caught on something. I'll be there in a minute.
translation.ja: 待って　忘れ物をしたみたい

translation.en: Claire, someone's coming.
We should go.
What have you got there?
I'm looking for that plant.
I think it's a forget- me- not, but I'm not sure.
translation.ja: 忘れな草だと思うけど

translation.en: Why don't you pop back and get it?
I was considering it.
Would you care to go with me?
Darling, I'd love to, but I've got an appointment with the Reverend.
translation.ja: 悪いけど 牧師と約束があるんだ

translation.en: He found a box of materials last night. Bills of sale from Black Jack's quartermaster.
translation.ja: ブラック･ジャックにまつわる 資料があった

translation.en: That sounds terribly exciting.
Are you laughing at me?
Never.
- Shall I meet you for dinner later? - Yes.
translation.ja: 夕食には戻る？ ああ

translation.en: - Love you. - Love you.
Come here.
Once, traveling at night,
translation.ja: ある晩 車に乗っていて

translation.en: I fell asleep in the passenger seat of a moving car,
translation.ja: 後部座席で眠ってしまった

translation.en: lulled by the noise and the motion into an illusion of serene weightlessness.
translation.ja: 物音と揺れの中で 意識が宙をさまよっていた

translation.en: Then the driver took a bridge too fast.
translation.ja: その時 車が急加速した

translation.en: And I woke to see the world spinning outside the car windows,
translation.ja: 気づくと 窓の外で世界が回っていた

translation.en: and the sickening sensation of falling at high speed.
translation.ja: 急降下するような衝撃を感じた

translation.en: That is as close as I can come to describing what I experienced,
translation.ja: 例えるなら あの時のような感覚だ

translation.en: but it falls woefully short.
What?
When confronted with the impossible, the rational mind will grope for the logical.
translation.ja: ありえないことが起きると 人は答えを探す

translation.en: Perhaps I had stumbled onto the set of a cinema company filming a costume drama of some sort.
translation.ja: きっと私は時代劇の撮影現場に 紛れ込んだのだ

translation.en: But there was no logical reason for actors to fire live ammunition.
translation.ja: でも俳優なら 実弾は使わないだろう

translation.en: Frank?
What the devil are you doing?
You're not Frank.
No, madam. I am not.
Who the bloody hell are you?
I am Jonathan Randall Esquire, Captain of His Majesty's Eighth Dragoons.
translation.ja: ジョナサン･ランダル 第８竜騎兵隊の大尉だ

translation.en: At your service.
Who are you?
My husband is expecting me. He'll come looking for me if I'm not back in 10 minutes.
translation.ja: 戻らないと夫が捜しに来るわ

translation.en: Your husband? What's his name?
translation.ja: 夫がいるのか　名前は？

translation.en: What is his name?
- Frank. - Frank what?
translation.ja: フランクよ 姓は何だ？

translation.en: Frank Beauchamp. He's a teacher.
translation.ja: フランク･ビーチャム　教師よ

translation.en: Well, it's a pleasure to meet you, Mrs. Frank Beauchamp, a teacher's wife.
translation.ja: ビーチャムの奥様か 会えて光栄だ

translation.en: You must think me the fool.
You'll be well advised to tell me exactly who you are and why you're here.
translation.ja: 本当のことを言え 何者だ？ 何をしに来た？

translation.en: Madam, you'll find my patience is not infinite.
Get off me, you bastard.
The speech of a lady.
The language of a whore.
I choose the whore.
- What? - Druid!
Who are you?
Where are we going? Where are we go...
translation.ja: 一体 どこへ行くの

translation.en: Over here!
You men over there! Quickly!
I wanted it to be a dream, but I knew it wasn't.
translation.ja: 夢であってほしいが 恐らく現実だ

translation.en: If nothing else, my erstwhile savior fairly reeked of odors
translation.ja: 私を救ってくれた男が 発する悪臭は

translation.en: too foul to be part of any dream I was likely to conjure up.
translation.ja: 夢の中にしては あまりにひどかった

translation.en: Let's have a look at you then, lass.
I trust you're able to see me now?
What's your name?
I decided to continue using my maiden name.
translation.ja: 旧姓で通すことに決めた

translation.en: If they intended to ransom me, I didn't want to lead them back to Frank.
translation.ja: 身代金目当てなら 夫に迷惑がかかる

translation.en: Claire.
Claire Beauchamp.
Claire Beauchamp.
That's right. And just what the hell do you think...
You said you found her?
Aye.
She was havin' words with a certain Captain of dragoons with whom we are acquainted.
translation.ja: 竜騎兵連隊の大尉と 言い争ってました

translation.en: There seemed to be some question as to whether the lady was or was not a whore.
translation.ja: このご婦人が娼婦かどうかね

translation.en: And what was the lady's position in this discussion?
I am not.
We could put her to the test.
I don't hold with rape.
And we've not the time for it, anyway.
Dougal, I've no idea what she might be or who,
translation.ja: ドゥーガル 正体は不明ですが―

translation.en: but I'll stake my best shot she's not a whore.
We'll puzzle it out later.
We've got a good distance to go tonight. And we must do something about Jamie first.
translation.ja: 長旅の前に ジェイミーを何とかせねば

translation.en: Escape was my chief concern, but I had no idea where I was.
translation.ja: 逃げたかったが ここがどこかも分からない

translation.en: And trying to find the road back to Inverness in the gathering darkness felt like a fool's errand.
translation.ja: 闇が迫る中 インヴァネスへの 道を探すのは難しい

translation.en: Out o' joint, poor bugger.
You can't ride with it like that, can you, lad?
Hurts bad enough sitting still. I couldna manage a horse.
translation.ja: じっとしてるだけで痛い

translation.en: I don't mean to be leaving him behind.
There's no help for it, then. I'll have to force the joint back.
translation.ja: じゃ 関節を元に戻すしかない

translation.en: The wisest course of action would have been to keep my head down, my mouth shut,
translation.ja: 今は おとなしくしてるのが 賢明だろう

translation.en: and wait for the search parties Frank must have called out by now.
translation.ja: フランクが捜してくれるはずだ

translation.en: Here, lad.
Hold him.
Don't you dare!
Stand aside at once.
You'll break his arm if you do it like that.
You have to get the bone of the upper arm in the correct position before it slips back into joint.
translation.ja: 先に 二の腕の骨を 正しい位置に戻さなきゃ

translation.en: Hold him steady.
This is the worst part.
It doesn't hurt anymore!
It will. It will be tender for about a week. You'll need a sling.
translation.ja: いいえ　あと１週間は痛むわ 三角巾が必要ね

translation.en: You, fetch me a long piece of cloth or a belt.
translation.ja: 細長い布かベルトを貸して

translation.en: Fetch me, she says. Do ye hear that, lads?
Give her yer belt.
I'm taking a guess you've done this before.
I'm a nurse.
Not a wet nurse.
translation.ja: 乳母(ウェットナース)じゃないわ

translation.en: You mustn't move the joint for two or three days.
When you begin to use it again, go very slowly at first.
translation.ja: 動かす時は とにかくゆっくりよ

translation.en: Stop at once if it hurts,
and use warm compresses on it daily.
All right, how does that feel?
Better. Thank ye.
translation.ja: よくなった　ありがとう

translation.en: Can you ride?
- Aye. - Good. We're leaving.
translation.ja: はい じゃ 行くぞ

translation.en: Where is it?
Where's the city? It should be visible from here.
Inverness?
You're looking straight at it.
There were no electric lights as far as the eye could see.
translation.ja: 電灯の明かりが どこにもなかった

translation.en: So, as much as my rational mind rebelled against the idea,
translation.ja: 私の理性は 認めることを拒んでいたが

translation.en: I knew in my heart I was no longer in the 20th century.
translation.ja: どうやら ここは20世紀ではないらしい

translation.en: Get yourself up.
You be sure to stay close to the rest of us.
And should ye try anythin' else, I shall slit your throat for you. Do you understand me?
translation.ja: 勝手なマネをしたら ノドをかき切るぞ

translation.en: Gimme your foot. Give it to me.
Careful! What are you trying to do?
translation.ja: 気をつけて　何をする気？

translation.en: I'll get my plaid loose to cover ye.
You're shivering.
Thank you, but I'm fine, really.
You're shaking so hard, it's making my teeth rattle.
The plaid will keep us both warm,
but I canna do it one- handed. Can ye reach?
We don't want you to freeze before sun- up.
Sun- up?
You mean we'll be riding all night?
All night,
and the next one, too, I reckon.
Fine time of year for a ride, though.
translation.ja: 乗馬には いい季節だ

translation.en: You see up there?
I know this place.
Been through here before, have ye?
Yes.
The 17th and 18th centuries, you'd have often found a British Army patrol up there.
translation.ja: 17～18世紀に イングランド軍の偵察兵がいた

translation.en: I recognize that rock. The one that looks like a cock's tail.
translation.ja: あの雄鶏の尾の形をした岩

translation.en: It has a name.
Cocknammon Rock.
translation.ja: コックナモン･ロックだ

translation.en: The English, they used it for ambushes!
translation.ja: イングランド軍がいるはずよ

translation.en: They could be lying in wait right now.
It's a bonnie place for an ambush, right enough.
Dougal.
Dougal. Dougal.
Now, you'll be telling me exactly how and why you come to know there's an ambush up ahead.
translation.ja: なぜ あそこに 偵察兵がいると思うのか教えろ

translation.en: I don't know, but I heard the redcoats use Cocknammon...
translation.ja: “赤軍服”がいると 聞いたことが…

translation.en: Where did you hear?
In the village.
Hide yourself!
Lost yer way?
Hope you haven't been misusing that shoulder.
You're hurt!
This lot isn't my blood.
Not much of it anyway.
Dougal and the others will be waiting further up the stream.
translation.ja: ドゥーガルたちが 上流で待ってる

translation.en: We should go.
- I'm not going with you! - Yes, you are.
translation.ja: お断りよ 来るんだ

translation.en: What? Are you going to cut my throat if I don't?
translation.ja: 拒んだらノドをかき切る？

translation.en: Why, no?
But... You don't look that heavy.
translation.ja: だが あなたは軽そうだ

translation.en: Now if ye won't walk,
I shall pick you up and throw you over my shoulder.
translation.ja: 肩に担いでいくまでだ

translation.en: Do ye want me to do that?
No!
Well, then,
I suppose that means you're coming with me.
Serves you right. Probably torn muscles as well as bruising.
translation.ja: 自業自得よ きっと筋が切れてるわ

translation.en: Well, it wasn't much of a choice.
If I'd not moved my shoulder, I'd never have moved anything else ever again.
translation.ja: 肩を動かさなきゃ死んでた

translation.en: I can handle a single redcoat with one hand, maybe even two.
translation.ja: 赤軍服の１人や２人は 楽に倒せるが

translation.en: But not three.
Besides, ye can fix it for me again when we get to where we're going.
translation.ja: 肩は また治してくれるだろ

translation.en: That's what you think.
You have. Here's to you, lass.
translation.ja: お疲れさん　乾杯だ

translation.en: For tipping us to the villains in the rocks and giving us a wee bit o' fun!
translation.ja: あんたのお陰で敵を出し抜いた 楽しめたよ

translation.en: Have a wee nip.
It willna fill your belly, but it will make ye forget you're hungry.
translation.ja: 少しでも空腹を忘れられる

translation.en: Stop!
Help! He's going over!
Help me get him up!
Come on.
Take it easy.
Easy now.
Gunshot wound. The idiot could've said something.
translation.ja: 撃たれたのに黙ってたのね

translation.en: It's a clean exit. I think the round's gone straight through the muscle.
translation.ja: 弾は貫通してる 傷口もきれいね

translation.en: I don't think it's serious, but he's lost a lot of blood.
It'll need to be disinfected before I can dress it properly.
translation.ja: 包帯の前に消毒しなきゃ

translation.en: Disinfect?
Yes, it must be cleaned of dirt to protect it from germs.
translation.ja: 雑菌が入らないようにするの

translation.en: Germs?
Just get me some iodine.
Merthiolate?
Alcohol?
Here you go.
Welcome back.
I'm all right, just a wee bit dizzy.
You are not all right.
Didn't you tell how badly you were bleeding?
You're lucky you're not dead, brawling and fighting and throwing yourself off horses.
translation.ja: 無茶ばかりね 命があるだけ幸運よ

translation.en: All right, I need a sterile bandage and some clean cloth.
translation.ja: 滅菌済みの包帯と清潔な布を

translation.en: Jesus H. Roosevelt Christ.
Hold still.
Easy.
Lift him up.
Come on, you goddamn bloody bastard.
translation.ja: いい加減にして　ふざけるな

translation.en: I've never heard a woman use such language in my life.
Your husband should tan your hide for ye, woman.
St. Paul says, Let a woman be silent, and...
You can mind your own bloody business and so can St. Paul!
translation.ja: 引っ込んでて 聖パウロにも伝えて

translation.en: And if you move so much as a single muscle while I'm tying this bandage,
translation.ja: 包帯を巻く間 少しでも動いたら

translation.en: I'll bloody throttle you.
Threats, is it?
And after I shared my drink with ye.
We have 15 miles to go yet.
Five hours, at the least, if not seven.
We'll stay long enough for ye to stem the bleeding and dress his wound. No more than that.
translation.ja: さっさと止血して包帯を巻け

translation.en: He needs rest.
- Did you hear me? - Randall...
translation.ja: 聞いてる？ ランダル…

translation.en: The officer ye encountered,
translation.ja: あなたが会った将校の名だ

translation.en: he won't give up so easily.
He commands the redcoats hereabouts
and he's sent patrols out in every direction by now.
translation.ja: 今ごろ偵察兵を出してる

translation.en: We canna stay here long.
You know Randall? Black Jack Randall, that is?
translation.ja: ランダルって ブラック･ジャックのこと？

translation.en: Aye.
I won't risk you or anyone else being taken prisoner by that man.
translation.ja: 仲間を危険にさらすわけに いかない

translation.en: If ye canna fix me up well enough to ride,
you'll be leaving me here with a loaded pistol
so I may determine my own fate.
You might've well told me you were shot before you fell off the horse.
translation.ja: なぜ撃たれたことを 黙ってたの？

translation.en: Didn't hurt much at the time.
Does it hurt now?
Aye.
Good.
That's about all I can do. The rest is up to you.
translation.ja: 手は尽くした 後は あなた次第よ

translation.en: Thank you, Sassenach.
Truly.
All right, on your horse, soldier.
Castle Leoch.
I'd been here with Frank two days ago.
translation.ja: フランクと来たのは２日前

translation.en: Or was that in the future?
How could I remember something that hadn't happened yet?
translation.ja: 未来の記憶など あるはずないのに

translation.en: So far, I'd been assaulted, threatened, kidnapped and nearly raped.
translation.ja: 既に私は襲われてさらわれて 犯されかけたが

translation.en: And somehow, I knew that my journey had only just begun.
translation.ja: まだ旅は始まりに過ぎないと 分かっていた
